title: cygan
author: cygan
content: the Ballet company has released its own wallet version just in time for the annual Bitcoin pizza day.but personally i find it very similar to the last version from 2020, not to say almost copied  2022 edition: 2020 edition:@MoparMiningLLC will certainly organize a collective order again if you want you can also start this here in this thread - then I would also change the thread title a bit

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: yea they are pretty similar but I will still order a set - wish they would do as they have told me numerous times and let me know when there is a new version so I can post a group buy - as it is, pizza day is tomorrow so a bit late.if there is interest still - I can set one up. let me see for how long they will be sold for

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: okay - so i would still be interested in the very great similarity and would order 2 wallets from youshould¬† then change the thread title now?
